COVID-19 lab in Cagayan de Oro to open in two weeks tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736186 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/736186/covid-19-lab-in-cagayan-de-oro-to-open-in-two-weeks/story/ The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) testing laboratory in Cagayan de Oro City will open in two weeks. According to Mayor Oscar Moreno, the COVID-19 laboratory will be equipped with two polymerase chain reaction (PCR) machines, the gold standard in COVID-19 testing. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 01:19:33 +0800

Paranaque has only distributed P200M out of P600-M aid package tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736166 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736166/paranaque-has-only-distributed-p200m-out-of-p600-m-aid-package/story/ Of the P600-million fund, only P200 millon has so far been handed out to beneficiaries of the social amelioration program in Paranaque City. With only a day to go before the deadline for distribution imposed by the national government, officials say it would be impossible to meet the requirement, according to Marisol Abdurahman's Wednesday report on 24 Oras.
